attributes.action: Award Mr Dave Pace an MBE for services to the community of Droylsden.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr David Pace has for over a decade devoted all of his time and effort into the continual development of the community of Droylsden (Greater Manchester) through sport. The people of Droylsden and surrounding area’s feel an overwhelming sense of gratitude and debt for what Mr Pace has achieved as both Manager and Chairman of Droylsden Football Club.    

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minster to award Mr Pace membership of   The Most Excellent Order of the British Empire for the following achievements.

1.	Developing the local economy of Droylsden through his business activities.
2.	Promoting sport in the local community through football.
3.	The development of cross community cohesion through the enhancement of a shared understanding of local values and positive ideals.
4.	Promotion to the Blue Square National from the Conference North.
5.	Instilling a sense of hope for the future of the National Game.
6.	The demolition of Stalybridge FC 6-1, thus eradicating division in the local community by demonstrating there is actually only ONE team in Tameside!

.
